coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered including corneal, bone marrow; donor costs included - excluding organ cost and related donor costs.
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 10,000.00. Crowns, bridges (non-precious metals), post/core, implants covered up to full limit. Scaling twice a year.
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit; for life-threatening and non-threatening conditions
coverage_details.maternity: SR 20,000.00. Caesarean/legal abortion/all delivery complications covered up to annual limit. Epidural anesthesia for normal delivery. Vitamins related to pregnancy. Assisted/artificial insemination techniques/pregnancy induction drugs: result-pregnancies covered, but cost of techniques not covered.
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00. Includes medical contact lenses. Frames covered up to optical limit. Optical covered without deductible for all classes. Lasik and correction up to 6,000 SR including Multifocal IOL.
coverage_details.screening: Covered - Up to Annual Limit, and preventive screening as per CHI.
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Physical therapy: first 6 sessions are auto-approved. Up to annual limit.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorisation required for outpatient & in-patient services except for some outpatient services which have limits. Outpatient dental, delivery, optical, kidney dialysis, hearing aids may require pre-authorisation. Medication Limit Equal To Pre-Authorization Approval Limit: SR 500,000.00.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Chronic coverage: diabetic medical devices (CGM, freestyle libra), all related devices and accessories covered. Work related injuries, artificial limbs/spine, sleep apnea, periodic claims reporting provided, private room up to SR 1,500. In-House clinic up to SR 632,000. Reception staff for in-house clinic: 18,000 SR/month. Executive checkups: 50 members x 3,000 SR/member (needs RM approval). Marketing package highest activities. Visiting doctor: 600 SR/day. Companion for children (male up to 14, female up to 20). 1 full time delegate. Psoriasis: up to 500,000 SR. Ambulance fully covered. Emergency outside KSA: up to 50,000 SR. Joint replacement up to CHI. Alcohol swaps, sugar strips, crutches, back belts, bandages, mouth/vaginal wash, accessories if medically required. All laboratory tests/medical exams if prescribed for covered disease. Hormone analysis/test: covered. Allergy tests up to 4,000 SR (prescribed). Vitamins: covered if prescribed. Treatment of allergy illness up to annual limit. Artificial spine covered. Consistence marketing.
